# maskedContentView

**Instance Property**

The content view in focus.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maskedContentView: UIView { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to modify the parallax effect applied on the cell and its content. Add any other UI elements to be included on the cell to this view.

This view fills the entire screen.

## Accessing Cell Views

- **maskedBackgroundView**: The background view that performs the parallax effect.

items.description: The background view that performs the parallax effect.
